original_text: They said to Moses, ‘The people are bringing many more gifts than we need to finish the tabernacle, as the Lord commanded us to do.’
korean_text: 모세에게 말하여 이르되 백성이 너무 많이 가져오므로 여호와께서 명령하신 일에 쓰기에 남음이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: The people are bringing many more gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 필요한 것보다 훨씬 더 많은 예물을 가져오고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: than we need to finish the tabernacle
as the Lord commanded us to do
